description:
Attract-Mode is a graphical frontend for command line emulators such as MAME, MESS, and Nestopia. It hides the underlying operating system and is intended to be controlled with a joystick, gamepad or spin dial, making it ideal for use in arcade cabinet setups.
    
        Attract-Mode will be installed to c:\attract-2.3.0
summary: A graphical front-end for command line emulators that hides the underlying operating system and is intended to be controlled with a joystick or gamepad. http://attractmode.org
author: mickelson
